data.name: Insane Town
data.detailed_description:
"Insane Town" is a social deduction FPS game; each player is assigned one of the three roles proposed by the game: insane, healthy or doctor. The INSANE people will have to kill all the HEALTHY ones while, the others, will have to understand who are the insane in order to defend themselves and try to survive. Finally, the DOCTORS will have to endeavor themselves to fight the insane alongside the healthy.
Minimum 2 players to play.
Minimum 5 players for a doctor.
Max 16 players per server, 8 healthy, 5 insane, 3 doctor.
data.about_the_game:
"Insane Town" is a social deduction FPS game; each player is assigned one of the three roles proposed by the game: insane, healthy or doctor. The INSANE people will have to kill all the HEALTHY ones while, the others, will have to understand who are the insane in order to defend themselves and try to survive. Finally, the DOCTORS will have to endeavor themselves to fight the insane alongside the healthy.
Minimum 2 players to play.
Minimum 5 players for a doctor.
Max 16 players per server, 8 healthy, 5 insane, 3 doctor.
data.short_description: The key elements of the game will be ingenuity and teamwork in order to understand other playersâ€™ roles, implement strategies, kill opponents, disguise themselves and resist until time runs out.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2500U or Intel Core i5 650
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 550 or NVIDIA GT 1030
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard, Microphone, Headphones
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
